医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
社会经济地位可能无法清楚地预测种族和族裔群体的心脏健康状况理想心血管健康的社会经济地位（教育、收入、就业状况和健康保险）的改善可能不会平等地使所有种族或族裔群体的人受益，因为在美国，白人成年人比黑人、西班牙裔和亚裔成年人更有可能受益，根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》上的新研究，该杂志是美国心脏协会的开放获取、同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Socioeconomic-status-may-not-clearly-predict-the-heart-health-of-racial-and-ethnic-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Socioeconomic-status-may-not-clearly-predict-the-heart-health-of-racial-and-ethnic-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84aa919b-1989-40f3-868a-38eed9fb8866 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 15:44:47 -0400 Socioeconomic status may not clearly predict the heart health of racial and ethnic groups
研究报告称，大多数反流病患者患癌症的风险并不较高反流病表现为胃酸反流和胃灼热，是食道癌的已知危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Majority-of-病人-with-reflux-disease-do-not-have-higher-risk-of-cancer-study-reports.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Majority-of-病人-with-reflux-disease-do-not-have-higher-risk-of-cancer-study-reports.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1965c6f2-ef66-489d-87c2-d1a929dceb0e Wed, 13 Sep 2023 15:29:47 -0400 Majority of patients with reflux disease do not have higher risk of cancer, study reports
研究有助于解释为什么实体瘤经常扩散到脊柱威尔康奈尔医学院研究人员领导的一项研究表明，形成脊柱的椎骨源自一种独特类型的干细胞，该干细胞分泌有利于肿瘤转移的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Study-helps-explain-why-solid-tumors-often-spread-to-the-spine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Study-helps-explain-why-solid-tumors-often-spread-to-the-spine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a77e9ca1-b4fe-4457-be69-b37c942d2811 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 15:25:02 -0400 Study helps explain why solid tumors often spread to the spine
研究人员获得 266 万英镑用于测试非小细胞肺癌的新免疫治疗策略利物浦大学的研究人员已获得医学研究委员会 266 万英镑的资助，用于临床测试一种针对非小细胞肺癌（最致命的癌症之一）的新型免疫治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Researchers-receive-c2a3266M-to-test-new-immunotherapeutic-strategy-for-non-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Researchers-receive-c2a3266M-to-test-new-immunotherapeutic-strategy-for-non-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=363c21fe-6ac2-4d61-925b-025df9537f3d Wed, 13 Sep 2023 15:20:53 -0400 Researchers receive £2.66M to test new immunotherapeutic strategy for non-small cell lung cancer
研究发现小脑抑制性中间神经元对恐惧记忆至关重要路易斯安那州立大学新奥尔良健康中心细胞生物学和解剖学教授 Siqiong June Liu 博士领导的一项研究发现，小脑抑制性中间神经元对于恐惧记忆（一种情绪记忆的形成）至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Cerebellar-inhibitory-interneurons-essential-for-fear-memory-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Cerebellar-inhibitory-interneurons-essential-for-fear-memory-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45d20f79-32d9-4942-a723-91937a73ecf5 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 15:15:58 -0400 Cerebellar inhibitory interneurons essential for fear memory, study finds
新方法可以改善骨质疏松性骨折风险的预测如果在医疗保健领域引入一种识别骨质疏松性骨折风险的新方法，每年可能有数千人免受髋部骨折的困扰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/New-method-could-improve-prediction-of-osteoporotic-fracture-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/New-method-could-improve-prediction-of-osteoporotic-fracture-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9001142-9506-40a0-9a83-f1c64059b027 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 15:11:31 -0400 New method could improve prediction of osteoporotic fracture risk
加州大学河滨分校的研究揭示了新冠病毒的致命弱点加州大学河滨分校的新研究揭示了新冠病毒的致命弱点：它的复制依赖于关键的人类蛋白质——；它可以用来防止病毒使人生病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/UC-Riverside-study-uncovers-COVIDs-Achilles-heel.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/UC-Riverside-study-uncovers-COVIDs-Achilles-heel.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33457b86-e9dd-42a5-9424-3353f99b459a Wed, 13 Sep 2023 15:05:09 -0400 UC Riverside study uncovers COVID's Achilles heel
ChatGPT 在支持急诊医学医生方面表现出承诺在周六开幕的欧洲急诊医学大会上公布的一项试点研究中，人工智能聊天机器人 ChatGPT 的表现与训练有素的医生一样，为急诊科正在评估的患者提供了可能的诊断建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/ChatGPT-shows-promise-in-supporting-doctors-in-emergency-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/ChatGPT-shows-promise-in-supporting-doctors-in-emergency-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a44c2577-9fbf-44b5-a0ca-ab43e030c09e Wed, 13 Sep 2023 15:01:44 -0400 ChatGPT shows promise in supporting doctors in emergency medicine
研究揭示绝经前双侧卵巢切除术的潜在负面长期影响人们越来越担心绝经前双侧卵巢切除术 (PBO) 可能产生有害的长期影响，导致选择主动切除双侧卵巢作为预防卵巢癌的女性人数下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Study-reveals-潜在-阴性-长期-效应-of-绝经前-双侧-卵巢切除术.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Study-reveals-潜在-阴性-长期-效应-of-绝经前-双侧-卵巢切除术.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8fa5582-2602-4971-95ac-966598aeb0da Wed, 13 Sep 2023 14:51:07 -0400 Study reveals potential negative long-term effects of premenopausal bilateral oophorectomy
研究揭示“TonEBP”蛋白在狼疮和狼疮肾炎中的作用UNIST 生物科学系的 Hyug Moo Kwon 教授及其研究团队与延世大学的 Jaeseok Yang 教授合作，取得了一项突破性的发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Study-sheds-new-light-on-the-role-of-TonEBP- Protein-in-lupus-and-lupus-nephritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/Study-sheds-new-light-on-the-role-of-TonEBP- Protein-in-lupus-and-lupus-nephritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0356a4f3-5a85-46bd-8082-dc59761f29a2 Wed, 13 Sep 2023 14:44:24 -0400 Study sheds new light on the role of 'TonEBP' protein in lupus and lupus nephritis
